man proposes, god disposes

NAME lilypad
DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - I have studied the sublime and the picturesque. Landscapes were carved, rivers dammed and villages flattened in the pursuit of the sublime, only ever achieving a mortal shadow.  
  - A rich trader once changed the course of a river so that his political rivals had to look at a perfect swan shaped lake.
  - The clone shape of our landscape is an artifact of our obsession with assuming a divine will.
  - The rolling hills and framed views are a sham, the picturesque a mockery of nature. We've fossilised the countryside. 
  - Where is the country you'd die for? And what is the century?
  - A painting of a polar bear shredding a corpse at the pole, covered by a flag in case it drives students mad. A warning of man's folly should we aspire too high. 
  - The bears are now starving, the ice long gone. The sublime has been subjugated and only carefully curated and conserved dust remains.
  - Like koi in a lily pond we circle, unwilling to contemplate a world outside our control
    
    We are stuck. 
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
bitsy culture is putting that one sprite in every one of your games

VAR a
42
